name: BobCAD-CAM Document
summary: Learn about .BBCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: BobCAD-CAM introduced the BobCAD-CAM Document (BBCD) format when it released version 22 of BobCAD-CAM. Before that version, the software saved designs in the .CAD format.

The format saves the design information in a document, which you can close and re-open to resume working on a design. To create a BBCD file, select File → New, modify the file, then select File → Save or Save as.

description: A BBCD file is a CAD design created by BobCAD-CAM, a CAD and CAM application for Windows. It stores a manufacturing part design and various geometry and dimensioning data (and may include instructions for milling the part). BobCAD-CAM users save CAD designs to preserve design progress and also export them to other CAD formats.

instructions: You can open BBCD files with BobCAD-CAM in Windows. For example, to open a BBCD file with BobCAD-CAM, select File → Open.
